ModMetaData.name: Spike Trap Blues
ModMetaData.author: Blues
ModMetaData.description:
Various features and settings about Spike Traps.
- Spike traps primarily target legs (moving limbs).
- Metallic spike traps will do stab damage, while stony traps will do crush damage. Woody traps will randomly do either.
- Stony spike traps can be used to capture wild animals.
- Stony spike traps can immobilize the enemies or wild animals without harming them.
- Damage, Armor Penetration, Trap Placement and more can be modified in the settings.
